title: Snapchat : distribution of global audiences 2020 , by gender
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Share of active users in each Sex on the y axis.
Sex Female has the highest Share of active users and Male has the lowest Share of active users.
The highest Sex Female has 23.0 more Share of active users than the lowest Sex Male.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Share of active users in the y axis.
Sex Female has the highest Share of active users and Male has the lowest Share of active users.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Share of active users in each Sex on the y axis.
Sex Female has the highest Share of active users and Male has the lowest Share of active users.
The highest Sex Female has 23.0 more Share of active users than the lowest Sex Male.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Share of active users in each Sex on the y axis.
The Share of active users is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The difference of Share of active users between the highest and lowest Sex is 23.0.
The Sex Female tends to be 1.23 percent higher than average.
The Share of active users is 99.0 if we add up values of all Sexs.
